---
title: "Contributing"
---

We welcome contributions to this guide.

## Ways to contribute

- **Code examples, data preparation workflows, or
  package vignettes** relevant to working with delayed
  surveillance data.
- **Case studies** from your surveillance system or
  jurisdiction.
- **Feedback** on the guide content, decision tree, or
  resources listed.

## How to contribute

Open an issue or pull request on the
[GitHub repository](https://github.com/epinowcast/GuideToSTLTReportingDelays).

For community examples, submit via the
[issue template](https://github.com/epinowcast/GuideToSTLTReportingDelays/issues/new?template=community-example.yml){target="_blank"}
with a link to your GitHub Gist.

## Contact

For questions, open a
[GitHub issue](https://github.com/epinowcast/GuideToSTLTReportingDelays/issues)
or contact [Sam Abbott](mailto:sam.abbott@lshtm.ac.uk).
